tool_description: Adjusts balance sheet items to market values and identifies off-balance sheet items for valuation purposes.

book_assets.description: Book values of major asset categories

error_messages: Asset data mismatch: Book assets and asset categories arrays must be same length.
Invalid asset values: Asset values must be non-negative.
Market value inconsistency: Market values array must match asset categories if provided.
Missing critical assets: Major asset categories (PPE, current assets) must be included.
usage: Provide book values of assets by category, with optional market value estimates. Tool identifies adjustments needed for valuation purposes.

hidden_value_indicators.description: Indicators of potential hidden asset value
